acquisition_protocol.description: The protocol used to acquire the dataset

description.description: A human readable description of an entity

experimenter.description: The experimenter that performed the imaging experiment

input_data.description: The input data for the analysis

input_parameters.description: The input parameters for the analysis

microscope.description: The microscope that was used to acquire the dataset

name.description: The human readable name of an entity

processed.description: Has the dataset been processed by microscope-metrics

sample.description: The physical sample that was imaged

field_illumination_images.description: Input parameter: homogeneity image provided in the order TZYXC. While the analysis accepts multiple channels, the T and Z dimensions are expected to be 1.

corner_fraction.description: Input parameter: the proportion of the image to be considered as corner or center

saturation_threshold.description: Tolerated saturation threshold. If the amount of saturated pixels is above this threshold,  the image is considered as saturated and the analysis is not performed.

sigma.description: Input parameter: the sigma for the smoothing gaussian filter to be applied prior to analysis

bottom_center_intensity_mean.description: The mean intensity of the bottom-center of the image

bottom_center_intensity_ratio.description: The mean intensity of the bottom-center of the image  divided by the maximum intensity of the center of illumination

bottom_left_intensity_mean.description: The mean intensity of the bottom-left of the image

bottom_left_intensity_ratio.description: The mean intensity of the bottom-left of the image  divided by the maximum intensity of the center of illumination

bottom_right_intensity_mean.description: The mean intensity of the bottom-right of the image

bottom_right_intensity_ratio.description: The mean intensity of the bottom-right of the image  divided by the maximum intensity of the center of illumination

center_fitted_distance_relative.description: The relative distance of the fitted center of illumination to the center of the image. Relative to the distance to  an image corner. 0.0 is centered and 1.0 at a distance equal to the the corner of the image.

center_fitted_x.description: The x coordinate of the fitted center of illumination. In pixels

center_fitted_x_relative.description: The relative x position of the fitted center of illumination.  Relative to the image size along that axis. -1.0 is left edge, 0.0 is center and 1.0 is right edge.

center_fitted_y.description: The y coordinate of the fitted center of illumination. In pixels

center_fitted_y_relative.description: The relative y position of the fitted center of illumination.  Relative to the image size along that axis. -1.0 is upper edge, 0.0 is center and 1.0 is lower edge.

center_geometric_distance_relative.description: The relative distance of the geometric center to the center of the image. Relative to the distance to  an image corner. 0.0 is centered and 1.0 at a distance equal to the the corner of the image.

center_geometric_x.description: The x coordinate of the geometric center of the center of illumination region. In pixels

center_geometric_x_relative.description: The relative x position of the geometric center of the center of illumination region.  Relative to the image size along that axis. -1.0 is left edge, 0.0 is center and 1.0 is right edge.

center_geometric_y.description: The y coordinate of the geometric center of the center of illumination region. In pixels. One value per channel.

center_geometric_y_relative.description: The relative y position of the geometric center of the center of illumination region.  Relative to the image size along that axis. -1.0 is upper edge, 0.0 is center and 1.0 is lower edge. One value per channel.

center_of_mass_distance_relative.description: The relative distance of the centers of mass to the center of the image. Relative to the distance to  an image corner. 0.0 is centered and 1.0 at a distance equal to the the corner of the image. One value per channel.

center_of_mass_x.description: The x coordinate of the center of mass of the center of illumination region. In pixels. One value per channel.

center_of_mass_x_relative.description: The relative x position of the center of mass of the center of illumination region.  Relative to the image size along that axis. -1.0 is left edge, 0.0 is center and 1.0 is right edge. One value per channel.

center_of_mass_y.description: The y coordinate of the center of mass of the center of illumination region. In pixels. One value per channel.

center_of_mass_y_relative.description: The relative y position of the center of mass of the center of illumination region.  Relative to the image size along that axis. -1.0 is upper edge, 0.0 is center and 1.0 is lower edge. One value per channel.

center_region_area_fraction.description: The fraction of the area occupied by the center of illumination region. If the centre upper intensity fraction is 0.1, that means that the center of illumination occupies 10% of the area of the image. One value per channel.

center_region_intensity_fraction.description: The fraction of the upper intensity range occupied by the center of illumination region. That is, a value of 0.1 means that the center of illumination occupies the top 10% of the intensity range. microscope-metrics tries to adapt the threshold of this intensity so that the area occupied is not too large. One value per channel.

channel_id.description: The channel id to which the measurements apply

channel_name.description: The channel name to which the measurements apply

channel_nr.description: The channel number to which the measurements apply

description.description: A human readable description of an entity

image_id.description: The id of the image where the measurement was taken. If images are originary in OMERO this is the image_id.

image_name.description: The name of the image where the measurement was taken

max_intensity.description: The maximum intensity of the center of illumination

max_intensity_distance_relative.description: The relative distance of the maximum intensity to the center of the image. Relative to the distance to  an image corner. 0.0 is centered and 1.0 at a distance equal to the the corner of the image.

max_intensity_pos_x.description: The x coordinate of the maximum intensity of the center of illumination. In pixels

max_intensity_pos_x_relative.description: The relative x position of the maximum intensity of the center of illumination.  Relative to the image size along that axis. -1.0 is left edge, 0.0 is center and 1.0 is right edge.

max_intensity_pos_y.description: The y coordinate of the maximum intensity of the center of illumination. In pixels

max_intensity_pos_y_relative.description: The relative y position of the maximum intensity of the center of illumination.  Relative to the image size along that axis. -1.0 is upper edge, 0.0 is center and 1.0 is lower edge.

middle_center_intensity_mean.description: The mean intensity of the middle-center of the image

middle_center_intensity_ratio.description: The mean intensity of the middle-center of the image  divided by the maximum intensity of the center of illumination

middle_left_intensity_mean.description: The mean intensity of the middle-left of the image

middle_left_intensity_ratio.description: The mean intensity of the middle-left of the image  divided by the maximum intensity of the center of illumination

middle_right_intensity_mean.description: The mean intensity of the middle-right of the image

middle_right_intensity_ratio.description: The mean intensity of the middle-right of the image  divided by the maximum intensity of the center of illumination

name.description: The human readable name of an entity

table_data.description: A non-required slot for non-serializable table data object

top_center_intensity_mean.description: The mean intensity of the top-center of the image

top_center_intensity_ratio.description: The mean intensity of the top-center of the image  divided by the maximum intensity of the center of illumination

top_left_intensity_mean.description: The mean intensity of the top-left corner of the image

top_left_intensity_ratio.description: The mean intensity of the top-left corner of the image  divided by the maximum intensity of the center of illumination

top_right_intensity_mean.description: The mean intensity of the top-right corner of the image

top_right_intensity_ratio.description: The mean intensity of the top-right corner of the image  divided by the maximum intensity of the center of illumination

errors.description: The errors of the processing by microscope-metrics

intensity_profiles.description: Intensity profiles for the field illumination analysis in the different directions

key_measurements.description: Key-Value pairs containing the Key measurements for the field illumination analysis

processing_application.description: The application used to process the dataset

processing_datetime.description: The datetime of the processing by microscope-metrics

processing_entity.description: The entity that processed the dataset

processing_log.description: The log of the processing by microscope-metrics

processing_version.description: The version of the application used to process the dataset

roi_center_region.description: Mask ROIs marking the area of maximum illumination. One mask per channel.

roi_centers_fitted.description: Point ROIs marking the fitted center of the area of maximum illumination. One point per channel.

roi_centers_geometric.description: Point ROIs marking the geometric center of the area of maximum illumination. One point per channel.

roi_centers_max_intensity.description: Point ROIs marking the maximum intensity of the area of maximum illumination. One point per channel.

roi_centers_of_mass.description: Point ROIs marking the center of mass of the area of maximum illumination. When the image is very flat, the 99 percentile is used instead. One point per channel.

roi_corners.description: Rectangular ROIs used to compute the corner intensities. The sama ROI is assigned to multiple images.

roi_profiles.description: line ROIs used to compute the intensity profiles

validated.description: Has the dataset been validated by a human

warnings.description: The warnings of the processing by microscope-metrics

PSFBeads.description: A sample of sub-resolution sized beads used to measure the PSF of a microscope.

bead_diameter_micron.description: The diameter of the beads in the sample measured in microns.

description.description: A human readable description of an entity

name.description: The human readable name of an entity

preparation_protocol.description: The protocol used to prepare a sample

PSFBeads.title: PSFBeads

acquisition_protocol.description: The protocol used to acquire the dataset

description.description: A human readable description of an entity

experimenter.description: The experimenter that performed the imaging experiment

input_data.description: The input data for the analysis

input_parameters.description: The input parameters for the analysis

microscope.description: The microscope that was used to acquire the dataset

name.description: The human readable name of an entity

processed.description: Has the dataset been processed by microscope-metrics

sample.description: The physical sample that was imaged

psf_beads_images.description: The image containing the beads provided in the order TZYXC. More than one image can be provided if the image conditions are the same.

fitting_r2_threshold.description: Threshold for the coefficient of determination (R^2) of the fit to be considered good.

intensity_robust_z_score_threshold.description: Threshold for the robust z-score of the intensity of the bead to be considered good.

min_lateral_distance_factor.description: Minimal distance that has to separate laterally the beads represented as the  number of times the FWHM of the beads.

saturation_threshold.description: Tolerated saturation threshold. If the amount of saturated pixels is above this threshold,  the image is considered as saturated and the analysis is not performed.

sigma_x.description: Gaussian smoothing sigma to be applied to the image in the X axis prior to bead detection. Does not apply to resolution measurements

sigma_y.description: Gaussian smoothing sigma to be applied to the image in teh Y axis prior to bead detection. Does not apply to resolution measurements

sigma_z.description: Gaussian smoothing sigma to be applied to the image in the Z axis prior to bead detection. Does not apply to resolution measurements

snr_threshold.description: Signal to noise ratio threshold to be used for bead detection.

average_bead_fit_r2_x.description: Average coefficient of determination (R^2) for the fits in the X axis of the beads. One value per channel.

average_bead_fit_r2_y.description: Average coefficient of determination (R^2) for the fits in the Y axis of the beads. One value per channel.

average_bead_fit_r2_z.description: Average coefficient of determination (R^2) for the fits in the Z axis of the beads. One value per channel.

average_bead_fwhm_lateral_asymmetry_rati.description: Lateral FWHM asymmetry ratio for the average bead. One value per channel.

average_bead_fwhm_micron_x.description: FWHM for the average bead in the X axis in microns. One value per channel.

average_bead_fwhm_micron_y.description: FWHM for the average bead in the Y axis in microns. One value per channel.

average_bead_fwhm_micron_z.description: Average FWHM for the beads in the Z axis in microns. One value per channel.

average_bead_fwhm_pixel_x.description: FWHM for the average bead in the X axis in pixels. One value per channel.

average_bead_fwhm_pixel_y.description: FWHM for the average bead in the Y axis in pixels. One value per channel.

average_bead_fwhm_pixel_z.description: FWHM for the average bead in the Z axis in pixels. One value per channel.

average_bead_intensity_integrated.description: Integrated intensity for the average bead. One value per channel.

average_bead_intensity_max.description: Maximum intensity for the average bead. One value per channel.

average_bead_intensity_min.description: Minimum intensity for the average bead. One value per channel.

average_bead_intensity_std.description: Standard deviation of the intensity for the average bead. One value per channel.

channel_name.description: The channel name to which the measurements apply

channel_nr.description: The channel number to which the measurements apply

considered_axial_edge_count.description: Number of beads considered as being too close to the top and or bottom of the image. These beads are not considered for the z axis FWHM measurements. One value per channel.

considered_bad_fit_x_count.description: Number of beads considered as having a bad fit quality in the x axis. The fitting meassureemnts are  not averaged into the key measurements. One value per channel.

considered_bad_fit_y_count.description: Number of beads considered as having a bad fit quality in the y axis. The fitting meassureemnts are  not averaged into the key measurements. One value per channel.

considered_bad_fit_z_count.description: Number of beads considered as having a bad fit quality in the z axis. The fitting meassureemnts are  not averaged into the key measurements. One value per channel.

considered_intensity_outlier_count.description: Number of beads considered as being too intense and potentially represent a cluster of beads. These beads have a robust z-score over the requested threshold. Measurements on these beads are not averaged into the key measurements. One value per channel.

considered_lateral_edge_count.description: Number of beads considered for being too close to the edge of the image. One value per channel.

considered_self_proximity_count.description: Number of beads considered for being too close to another bead. One value per channel.

considered_valid_count.description: Number of beads analyzed. One value per channel.

description.description: A human readable description of an entity

fit_r2_x_mean.description: Mean coefficient of determination (R^2) in the x axis for the analyzed beads. One value per channel.

fit_r2_x_median.description: Median coefficient of determination (R^2) in the x axis for the analyzed beads. One value per channel.

fit_r2_x_std.description: Standard deviation of the coefficient of determination (R^2) in the x axis for the analyzed beads. One value per channel.

fit_r2_y_mean.description: Mean coefficient of determination (R^2) in the y axis for the analyzed beads. One value per channel.

fit_r2_y_median.description: Median coefficient of determination (R^2) in the y axis for the analyzed beads. One value per channel.

fit_r2_y_std.description: Standard deviation of the coefficient of determination (R^2) in the y axis for the analyzed beads. One value per channel.

fit_r2_z_mean.description: Mean coefficient of determination (R^2) in the z axis for the analyzed beads. One value per channel.

fit_r2_z_median.description: Median coefficient of determination (R^2) in the z axis for the analyzed beads. One value per channel.

fit_r2_z_std.description: Standard deviation of the coefficient of determination (R^2) in the z axis for the analyzed beads. One value per channel.

fwhm_lateral_asymmetry_ratio_mean.description: Mean lateral FWHM asymmetry ratio for the analyzed beads. One value per channel.

fwhm_lateral_asymmetry_ratio_median.description: Median lateral FWHM asymmetry ratio for the analyzed beads. One value per channel.

fwhm_lateral_asymmetry_ratio_std.description: Standard deviation of the lateral FWHM asymmetry ratio for the analyzed beads. One value per channel.

fwhm_micron_x_mean.description: Mean FWHM for the analyzed beads in the X axis in microns. One value per channel.

fwhm_micron_x_median.description: Median FWHM for the analyzed beads in the X axis in microns. One value per channel.

fwhm_micron_x_std.description: Standard deviation of the FWHM for the analyzed beads in the X axis in microns. One value per channel.

fwhm_micron_y_mean.description: Mean FWHM for the analyzed beads in the Y axis in microns. One value per channel.

fwhm_micron_y_median.description: Median FWHM for the analyzed beads in the Y axis in microns. One value per channel.

fwhm_micron_y_std.description: Standard deviation of the FWHM for the analyzed beads in the Y axis in microns. One value per channel.

fwhm_micron_z_mean.description: Mean FWHM for the analyzed beads in the Z axis in microns. One value per channel.

fwhm_micron_z_median.description: Median FWHM for the analyzed beads in the Z axis in microns. One value per channel.

fwhm_micron_z_std.description: Standard deviation of the FWHM for the analyzed beads in the Z axis in microns. One value per channel.

fwhm_pixel_x_mean.description: Mean FWHM for the analyzed beads in the X axis in pixels. One value per channel.

fwhm_pixel_x_median.description: Median FWHM for the analyzed beads in the X axis in pixels. One value per channel.

fwhm_pixel_x_std.description: Standard deviation of the FWHM for the analyzed beads in the X axis in pixels. One value per channel.

fwhm_pixel_y_mean.description: Mean FWHM for the analyzed beads in the Y axis in pixels. One value per channel.

fwhm_pixel_y_median.description: Median FWHM for the analyzed beads in the Y axis in pixels. One value per channel.

fwhm_pixel_y_std.description: Standard deviation of the FWHM for the analyzed beads in the Y axis in pixels. One value per channel.

fwhm_pixel_z_mean.description: Mean FWHM for the analyzed beads in the Z axis in pixels. One value per channel.

fwhm_pixel_z_median.description: Median FWHM for the analyzed beads in the Z axis in pixels. One value per channel.

fwhm_pixel_z_std.description: Standard deviation of the FWHM for the analyzed beads in the Z axis in pixels. One value per channel.

intensity_integrated_mean.description: Mean integrated intensity of the analyzed beads. One value per channel.

intensity_integrated_median.description: Median integrated intensity of the analyzed beads. One value per channel.

intensity_integrated_std.description: Standard deviation of the integrated intensity of the analyzed beads. One value per channel.

intensity_max_mean.description: Mean maximum intensity of the analyzed beads. One value per channel.

intensity_max_median.description: Median maximum intensity of the analyzed beads. One value per channel.

intensity_max_std.description: Standard deviation of the maximum intensity of the analyzed beads. One value per channel.

intensity_min_mean.description: Mean minimum intensity of the analyzed beads. One value per channel.

intensity_min_median.description: Median minimum intensity of the analyzed beads. One value per channel.

intensity_min_std.description: Standard deviation of the minimum intensity of the analyzed beads. One value per channel.

intensity_std_mean.description: Mean standard deviation of the intensity of the analyzed beads. One value per channel.

intensity_std_median.description: Median standard deviation of the intensity of the analyzed beads. One value per channel.

intensity_std_std.description: Standard deviation of the standard deviation of the intensity of the analyzed beads. One value per channel.

name.description: The human readable name of an entity

table_data.description: A non-required slot for non-serializable table data object

total_bead_count.description: Total number of beads detected in the image. One value per channel.

analyzed_bead_centers.description: The centers of the beads that have been analyzed. One point shape will be provided per bead correctly detected. One ROI per channel.

average_bead.description: The average bead image created from all the beads considered valid. The average bead is calculated after aligning the beads in all three axes. This one image contains all the channels. If the analysis does not detect at least two beads in a channel, the average bead for this channel is not calculated.

bead_profiles_x.description: The intensity profiles along the x axis of the analyzed beads as well as the fits.

bead_profiles_y.description: The intensity profiles along the y axis of the analyzed beads as well as the fits.

bead_profiles_z.description: The intensity profiles along the z axis of the analyzed beads as well as the fits.

bead_properties.description: Properties associated with the analysis of the beads.

considered_bead_centers_axial_edge.description: The centers of the beads detected but considered as too close to the top and or bottom of the image. Measurements on these bead not considered for the dataset analysis. One point will be provided per bead. One ROI per channel.

considered_bead_centers_intensity_outlie.description: The centers of the beads detected but considered as being too intense and potentially represent a cluster of beads. Intensity robust z-score over requested threshold. Measurements on these bead not considered for the dataset analysis. One point will be provided per bead. One ROI per channel.

considered_bead_centers_lateral_edge.description: The centers of the beads detected but considered as too close to the edge of the image. Measurements on these bead not considered for the dataset analysis. One point will be provided per bead. One ROI per channel.

considered_bead_centers_self_proximity.description: The centers of the beads detected but considered as too close to another bead. Measurements on these bead not considered for the dataset analysis. One point will be provided per bead. One ROI per channel.

considered_bead_centers_x_fit_quality.description: The centers of the beads detected but considered as the fit quality in x was not good enough.  coefficient of determination (R^2) (R^2) over requested threshold. Measurements in x for this bead not considered for the dataset analysis. One point will be provided per bead. One ROI per channel.

considered_bead_centers_y_fit_quality.description: The centers of the beads detected but considered as the fit quality in y was not good enough.  coefficient of determination (R^2) (R^2) over requested threshold. Measurements in y for this bead not considered for the dataset analysis. One point will be provided per bead. One ROI per channel.

considered_bead_centers_z_fit_quality.description: The centers of the beads detected but considered as the fit quality in z was not good enough.  coefficient of determination (R^2) (R^2) over requested threshold. Measurements in z for this bead not considered for the dataset analysis. One point will be provided per bead. One ROI per channel.
